LanguageData.Charged.label: 전자탄
LanguageData.Charged.description: The charged particle coating disrupts armor and tissue in equal measure.
LanguageData.ChargedAP.label: 개량된 전자탄
LanguageData.ChargedAP.description: Focuses charged particles around the tip of the core for improved armor penetration at the cost of stopping power.
LanguageData.Ionized.label: 이온 전자탄
LanguageData.Ionized.description: Designed to combat mechanoids, the round creates an electrical current on impact, disrupting electronic systems temporarily.
LanguageData.IncendiaryFuel.label: 개량된 소이탄
LanguageData.IncendiaryFuel.description: Filled with incendiary agent that ignites after impact.
LanguageData.ThermobaricFuel.label: 개량된 열압력탄두
LanguageData.ThermobaricFuel.description: Filled with high-explosive aerosol that causes a large explosion and ignites flammable materials.
LanguageData.FoamFuel.label: 소화거품
LanguageData.FoamFuel.description: Special round designed for civilian fire-fighting purposes. Filled with fire-retardant foam to suppress fires in a large area.
